arts.ttl: Liverpool, PSG Owners Competing for Control of Spanish Second-Division Club With Potential
arts.sum: Liverpool and Paris Saint-Germain were facing off in the UEFA Champions League Round of 16, with the capital club advancing past the Reds. Now, the owners of these two clubs are reportedly facing off in another competition. arts.ttl: Arsenal, Tottenham Convinced by €50M-Rated PSG Flop at Juventus for Summer Pursuit
arts.sum: Randal Kolo Muani has made an immediate impact at Juventus, racking up seven goal contributions in 11 matches since arriving on loan from Paris Saint-Germain in the winter transfer window. PSG are hoping his strong form in Turin will generate interest ahead of the summer as the club look to recover at least half of […] The post Arsenal, Tottenham Convinced by €50M-Rated PSG Flop at Juventus for Summer Pursuit appeared first on PSG Talk.

arts.ttl: PSG edge closer to retaining Ligue 1 title after second-half St Etienne mauling
arts.sum: The league leaders claimed a 6-1 win.

arts.ttl: PSG’s £63M-Rated Target Willing to Make Major Sacrafice for Chelsea, Man Utd Move
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain have been linked to Victor Osimhen in the last two transfer windows, and with summer approaching, speculation is heating up. Now at Galatasaray, Osimhen have rediscovered the form that made him a standout in the 2022-23 season, attracting interest from top clubs across Europe. arts.ttl: Video: Watch Desire Doue’s Incredible Second-Half Brace Against ASSE in Ligue 1
arts.sum: After conceding an early goal to AS Saint-Étienne in the ninth minute from Lucas Stassin, Paris Saint-Germain scored three unanswered goals in the match, with the first coming from Goncalo Ramos, who converted a penalty just before halftime. Coming out of the break, PSG took the lead thanks to an excellent goal from Khvicha Kvaratskhelia. arts.ttl: Liverpool owners rival PSG in Spanish side takeover bid
arts.sum: Liverpool's owners, FSG, are exploring a takeover of Spanish side Malaga.
